claimReview.title: Does the UK really have the 12th largest 'female health gap' in the ...
claimReview.textualRating: This claim is based on very unreliable research from a male wellness company, which was deleted after Full Fact queried it. We can find no generally accepted definition of the ‘gender health gap’, but women in the UK have a longer life expectancy and healthy life expectancy than men, although they do experience a number of health disadvantages.
